summaries.summary: This agreement is between ABC Corporation, a Delaware corporation with its principal place of business at 123 Business Street, New York, NY 10001 (hereinafter referred to as 'Company'), and XYZ Enterprises, a California corporation with its principal place of business at 456 Enterprise Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94102 (hereinafter referred to as 'Client').
The undersigned parties agree to the following terms and conditions for the provision of consulting services.

SERVICE AGREEMENT. This Service Agreement (the 'Agreement') is made and entered into as of April 1, 2024, by and between Cloud Services LLC, a limited liability company organized under the laws of the State of Texas ('Provider'), and Retail Chain International, a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Florida ('Customer').
EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT. This Employment Agreement is entered into between Innovation Labs, Inc. ('Employer') and John Smith ('Employee') effective as of May 1, 2024.

LICENSE AGREEMENT. This Software License Agreement ('License') is entered into by and between DataSoft Technologies, a software development company, and Healthcare Systems Inc., a healthcare technology provider, as of June 1, 2024.
